item.description:
Join us for our 15th Annual fun fall getaway Columbus Day weekend in Bartlett, NH.

This is my favorite weekend of the Year!!

Start off your weekend with a scenic drive of covered bridges and beautiful fall foliage. You will end at the Skidaddler Sports Club. Spend 2-3 days enjoying area activities such as hiking, biking, outlet shopping, and more. Be our guest Saturday afternoon for a cookout and kick up your heels good time.

PLEASE SEND ME YOUR EMAIL FOR REGISTRATION FORM and RSVP YES if you are interested as space is limited.

THE REGISTRATION FORM AND MONIES ARE DUE NO LATER THAN OCTOBER 2, 2010
THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT!

PLEASE RSVP ON ONLY ONE MEET UP SITE!!!!! AS THIS EVENT IS POSTED ON the Skidaddlers Ski Club and Boston Ski Club Meet Ups!!

The lodge bedrooms are dormitory style with bunk beds. 4-6 per room. We have a male and female section. Bring your own bedding-linens, blanket and towels.

This event is 21+
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the house starting Friday evening!
item.name: Columbus Day Weekend..... Fall Getaway
